Año = X
Rendimiento = Y

x̅ = 1975
y̅ = 1330,46164948454
∑ x = 191575
∑ y = 129054,78
∑ x² = 378436673
∑ y² = 216119501,1024

= = =

#  y^i = β̂^1 + β̂^0

Sxx = 76048
Sxy = 1445678,080000043
β̂^1 = 19,010073638

β̂^0 = 1330,46164948454 - 19,010073638 * 1975 = −36214,433785565
 
=> Y = 19.010073638x - 36214.433785565

= = =

# R²

Syy = ∑ y² - ((∑ y)²/n) = 216119501,1024 - ((129054,78)²/97) = 44417065,629736082
SCE = Syy - ((Sxy)²/Sxx) = 44417065,629736082 - ((1445678,080000043)²/76048) = 16934618,872522076

R² = 1 − (SCE/Syy) = 0,618736208

= = =

# r

r = Sxy / (√Sxx*Syy) = 0,786597869
r = √R² = √0,618736208 = 0,786597869

= = =

# σ̂²

σ̂²= SCE/(n − 2)
Varianza años: 178259.14602654814


= = =

# IC(β̂^1)

Un intervalo de confianza de 100(1 − α)% para la pendiente β^1 de la lı́nea de regresión verdadera es:

 Si 1 − α = 0.95 => α = 0.05 

 β̂ 1 − t[α/2, n−2] * √(σ̂²/Sxx)  ;  β̂ 1 + t[α/2, n−2] * √(σ̂²/Sxx)

 19,010073638 − t[α/2, 97−2] * √(677384,754900883/76048)  ;  19,010073638 + t[α/2, 97−2] * √(677384,754900883/76048)
 19,010073638 − t[0.05/2, 97−2] * √(8,907331618)  ;  19,010073638 + t[0.05/2, 97−2] * √(8,907331618)
 19,010073638 − t[0.025, 95] * 2,984515307  ;  19,010073638 + t[0.025, 95] * 2,984515307
 19,010073638 − 1,9852 * 2,984515307  ;  19,010073638 + 1,9852 * 2,984515307
 13,085213851  ;  24,934933425
 ( 13,085213851  ;  24,934933425 )

= = =

Intervalo de confianza para β0 años

-36214.433785565 - 1.9852 *  √ 1405735.9731028215 *( 1/97 + 1975^2 / 76048 ) = -53073.09130
 
-36214.433785565 + 1.9852 *  √ 1405735.9731028215 *( 1/97 + 1975^2 / 76048 ) = -19355.776266


(-53073.09130 ; -19355.776266)
